text_block_list.text:
I was at the shopping mall running an 
errand when I noticed a crowd of people.

Looking closer, I saw a sign that mentioned a new product launch. 
Apparently there was supposed to be a special guest——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
——Hm? 
……Why are you here?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Yeah. My family has a long relationship with this brand.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Including appearing in advertisements and helping 
with product development. With this new product too.

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text: Duramente-san! Are you finished with your preparations～?

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text:
Aah, as expected of Duramente-san, 
these new sneakers look good on you!

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text:
We're looking forward to your talk today too! We'd 
like to hear various opinions from a prestigious 
family, particularly around sports theory and such!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Yes. I look forward to working with you today.

She replied dutifully to the expectations of the staff…… 
But, she still looked a little stiff and nervous.
choice_data_list: Since I'm here, I'll listen too

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Do as you like.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
With these new high-tech sneakers, Duramente-san's 
family was involved throughout the development 
process. Can you tell us a bit about that?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Our focus was on reducing the amount of strain placed on a 
runner's legs. The design in particular took quite a bit of time.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
For someone currently active in the Racing World, Duramente-san, 
reducing the stress on your legs is quite an important issue, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
By wearing these sneakers on a regular basis and taking care of your 
legs, this would help your performance on the track, wouldn't it?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
This sneaker was designed specifically to fit a 
runner's needs as best as possible. The effectiveness 
of this product——I intend to prove in races.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
Oooh～!! We'll be looking forward to it then! 
To Duramente-san's races and, of course, the resulting sales!

text_block_list.name: Event Staff
text_block_list.text: Thank you for today!
choice_data_list: Dura, good work! Heading back now?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
——No, I'm heading to the gym. 
I need to test out a new machine there.

I was surprised by how busy her schedule was…… 
I was also interested in this new machine. Since 
I was already here, I figured I'd tag along.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
That's it. The Hack Squat machine. 
I need to assess it's usability and effectiveness——

text_block_list.name: Gym Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Wah, isn't that Duramente-san……!?

text_block_list.name: Gym Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
The rumors that she uses this gym must be true then…… 
She's probably here for the new machine isn't she?
choice_data_list: You really do get noticed a lot
You really do get noticed a lot

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……I'm used to it. 
After some warm-ups, I'm going to try that out.

I was a little worried about Duramente's condition, 
so I watched over her warm-up exercises……

text_block_list.name: Gym Bro
text_block_list.text: Just what will Duramente show us……!?

Duramente's hands were starting to 
get more and more pale. This is——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: (……Not good. My body is getting stiffer——)
choice_data_list: How about starting over with stretches?
How about starting over with stretches?

text_block_list.text:
With everyone's attention on her and the weight of their 
expectations, it wasn't a surprise she was getting nervous.
choice_data_list: You can try putting in earphones too

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Huu……! Huu……!

text_block_list.name: Gym Bro
text_block_list.text:
Awesome, isn't that much weight crazy……!? 
Just how much is she going to add……!!

text_block_list.name: Gym Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, let's go see! I want to see the 
difference in level from a normal Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
——Ha. 
Fuuーー…………

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ——……It stopped

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……Nothing, just thinking out loud. 
Let's do one more set.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Fuuーー…………Haa! Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Haaaa——!

text_block_list.name: Gym Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
——Uwah, she's going to keep going!? 
Her power and stamina are just so different……!

text_block_list.name: Gym Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Duramente really is amazing……!

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
……Yeah. It's effective and feels comfortable. 
It's worth considering implementation.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……Looks like you ended up accompanying me the entire time.

I was able to learn a lot about Duramente's daily life so it was 
a fruitful day. The gym in particular seemed to be worthwhile.

Tomorrow would be more training. 
I'm more motivated than ever to continue supporting her.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: Yeah——

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
——…… 
…………It feels warm……

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: …………What a mysterious person.
